name: Silent Station
description:
"Silent Station" is a social, psychological, multiplayer game based on the rules of the classic mafia, complemented by the features of setting death traps.

The rules are simple: there is a crew, there is a traitor.
The crew goal is to figure out the traitor and throw him out into space or complete all the tasks at the spaceship.

The traitor, on the other hand, can set death traps in advance or directly eliminate crew members.
(!) Block the door right in front of the victim's nose!
(!) Turn, initially peaceful crew members, into your monstermates!
(!) Hide bodies by breaking the spaceship lighting!
(!) Launch the self-destruct system!

All this awaits you at the "Silent Station"!
